name: Daniel Buckner
title: Chief Architect / Senior Product Manager
summary: Visionary product strategist and systems thinker blending deep AI architecture with narrative design. Experienced across fintech, healthcare, consulting, and creative technology sectors. Looking to lead product or architectural efforts at high-impact companies building for the future.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager | Agile Lead (Consultant)
highlights: Owned roadmap for in-store pharmacy system replacement across multiple teams.
Redesigned UX/UI for pharmacy operations improving employee workflows.
Created dashboards in Adobe Workspace to monitor user engagement.
Drove 15% increase in engagement via behavioral data analysis.
Facilitated SAFe Agile planning, backlog grooming, and retrospectives.

experience.title: Adobe Technical Consultant
highlights: Managed Adobe Experience Platform implementations for enterprise clients.
Configured custom segments and streaming destinations across cloud pipelines.
Translated marketing strategy into technical architecture design documents.
